message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $8,000.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I would like to propose a price of $9,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to both of us.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This price is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to the value I'm seeking.  What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $9,100. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that respects both our interests.
Bob, I see we're getting closer.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,150. This is my final offer, as I'm very close to my minimum.  Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Based on the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $9,125. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
